title: Please Share if you own a Pixel 5 only: Does your auto rotate work?
content:
Hey all,

So this is crazy, my auto rotate does not work.  It's turned on and my phone is all updated, I even did a factory reset as per Google support.  Nothing has helped and I cant get the screen to rotate on its own.  If I take a picture in landscape, it's saves sideways, in YouTube when I rotate the screen nothing happens. 

I downloaded an app to check the gyroscope sensors (gyroscope test).. it says that it cannot detect a gyroscope, accelerator, magnetor, on my phone. 

What's even crazier is that my wife's pixel 5 has the exact same issue, and two of friends as well... None of them realized it until I pointed it out and I'll be honest I didn't notice it for a week. 

Please post below and let me know if your auto rotate is working or not or if you know of a solution to this.
